医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Kuano 完成 180 万英镑种子轮融资，以验证药物发现的量子模拟平台Kuano 是一家将量子力学与人工智能相结合来设计下一代药物的药物发现公司，今天宣布完成了由 Mercia Ventures 牵头的 180 万英镑种子轮融资，参投方包括 ACF Investors、Ascension Ventures、o2h Ventures、Meltwind Advisory LLP 和其他天使投资人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Kuano-closes-c2a318M-seed-funding-round-to-validate-quantum-simulation-platform-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Kuano-closes-c2a318M-seed-funding-round-to-validate-quantum-simulation-platform-for-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=424c083d-b344-4021-b4f6-8445310653cb Wed, 13 Sep 2023 01:38:00 -0400 Kuano closes £1.8M seed funding round to validate quantum simulation platform for drug discovery
INTEGRA 的移液解决方案帮助 Axis Healthcare 支持患者克服阿片类药物成瘾Axis Healthcare 是俄克拉荷马州的一家家庭经营护理机构，已将 INTEGRA Biosciences 的 VOYAGER 可调节吸头间距移液器引入其 PCR 实验室工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/INTEGRAe28099s-pipetting-solutions-help-Axis-Healthcare-to-support-患者-in-overcoming-opioid-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/INTEGRAe28099s-pipetting-solutions-help-Axis-Healthcare-to-support-患者-in-overcoming-opioid-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=036d71d8-bfa6-4484-8876-91c403e05958 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 01:34:00 -0400 INTEGRA’s pipetting solutions help Axis Healthcare to support patients in overcoming opioid addiction
接种疫苗后的免疫力可提供更好的针对 COVID-19 的保护UNIGE 和 HUG 的团队分析了 50,000 名 COVID-19 阳性病例的接触者。接种疫苗后的免疫力可以为您周围的人提供更好的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Immunity-following-vaccination-provides-better-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Immunity-following-vaccination-provides-better-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0703cc8a-a0c0-45a7-8aaa-c53db52b5f7f Tue, 12 Sep 2023 23:54:00 -0400 Immunity following vaccination provides better protection against COVID-19
有针对性地使用超声技术可导致大脑功能发生显着变化一项新的研究表明，有针对性地使用超声波技术可以使大脑功能发生重大变化，从而为治疗抑郁、成瘾或焦虑等疾病铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Targeted-use-of-ultrasound-technology-can-lead-to-significant-changes-in-brain-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Targeted-use-of-ultrasound-technology-can-lead-to-significant-changes-in-brain-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd187683-b4e7-42c2-91e2-2172e004b6e8 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 23:46:51 -0400 Targeted use of ultrasound technology can lead to significant changes in brain function
研究：从 1999 年到 2020 年，美国药物过量死亡人数增加了四倍多美国正在经历一个多世纪以来最高的总体死亡率，部分原因是药物过量死亡率。当前流行病的起源至少部分归因于 1986 年世界卫生组织的一项声明，即疼痛治疗是一项普遍权利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-Drug-overdose-deaths-in-the-US-more-than-quadrupled-from-1999-to-2020.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-Drug-overdose-deaths-in-the-US-more-than-quadrupled-from-1999-to-2020.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87b71bf3-bfab-4544-b4f8-ade71b4c52af Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:57:12 -0400 Study: Drug overdose deaths in the U.S. more than quadrupled from 1999 to 2020
卫生工作者培训计划旨在减轻马拉维乳腺癌的负担马拉维农村地区的妇女正在学习如何检测乳腺癌，这得益于该国第一个针对卫生工作者的专门培训计划，旨在减轻疾病负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Training-program-for-health-workers-aims-to-reduce-the-burden-of-breast-cancer-in-Malawi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Training-program-for-health-workers-aims-to-reduce-the-burden-of-breast-cancer-in-Malawi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=051e4cd1-02f7-4bfc-827f-82b516630ae5 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:37:13 -0400 Training program for health workers aims to reduce the burden of breast cancer in Malawi
抑制剂组合可以抑制肿瘤生长并预防癌症复发一个国际研究小组证明，抑制剂组合可以抑制某些癌症患者的肿瘤生长并预防复发，包括头颈鳞状细胞癌和肺腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/A-combination-of-inhibitors-may-suppress-tumor-growth-and-prevent-cancer-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/A-combination-of-inhibitors-may-suppress-tumor-growth-and-prevent-cancer-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93848cc0-09dc-4dcf-9814-a1aa5ca8325b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:27:09 -0400 A combination of inhibitors may suppress tumor growth and prevent cancer relapse
智商会影响 COVID-19 疫苗接种决策吗？ 《健康经济学杂志》上的这项研究发现，认知能力显着影响人们接种 COVID-19 疫苗的比率。事实证明，提前预约可以有效提高疫苗接种率，尤其是那些认知能力得分较低的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Does-IQ-influence-COVID-19-vaccination-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Does-IQ-influence-COVID-19-vaccination-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2354d22-b478-44dc-8ced-addaf6b11188 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:27:00 -0400 Does IQ influence COVID-19 vaccination decision-making?
美国心脏病学会发起新活动以加强低密度脂蛋白诊断筛查美国心脏病学会通过与 Amgen 和 Esperion 的战略合作，正在发起一项新的质量改进活动，“推动 LDL 筛查的紧迫性”，以提高没有既往心脏事件的患者以及那些患有心脏病的患者的诊断性 LDL 筛查率。与已知的心血管疾病一起帮助临床医生根据医疗指南确定需要治疗的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/American-College-of-Cardiology-launches-new-campaign-to-increase-diagnostic-LDL-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/American-College-of-Cardiology-launches-new-campaign-to-increase-diagnostic-LDL-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47cbd59f-5b98-4383-a3ec-0b2030273d0e Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:18:22 -0400 American College of Cardiology launches new campaign to increase diagnostic LDL screening
研究揭示了改善骨髓瘤治疗的潜在目标新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 新加坡癌症科学研究所 (CSI Singapore) 的研究人员进行的一项开创性研究揭示了组蛋白甲基转移酶 NSD2 及其表观遗传靶点 PKCα 在导致 t(4; 14) 易位的多发性骨髓瘤（MM）（一种血癌的高危亚型）变得更具侵袭性和对治疗具有抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-pottial-targets-to-improve-the-treatment-of-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-pottial-targets-to-improve-the-treatment-of-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8659b594-82a2-4b7e-8b3e-d3557e36554b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 21:54:10 -0400 Study reveals potential targets to improve the treatment of myeloma
